content: I'm having trouble finding an element in the medication resources for discontinuing a medication order I need dc date and time. Can anyone point me in the right direction? Thanks
Also the dose units for a medication are eluding me as well. Any help with either of these would be much appreciated.

If you're looking at an order that was already discontinued, the stop date would be in the relevantHistory (along with other relevant actions like suspending, resuming, etc. If you're wanting to communicate a request to stop a med, that would use Task. The units for does are inside the Quantity data type.
